00043 static const char *me = NULL;
00044 static bool quiet = false;
00045 static cvq *vq = NULL;

00048  *
00049  */
00050 void usage()
00051 {
00052     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<< " [-q] [-s] (e-mail password){1,}"<<endl
00053         <<"\t-s\tstdin mode - read e-mail addresses and passwords from stdin"<<endl
00054         <<"\t-q\tquiet mode"<<endl
00055         <<endl
00056         <<"Change password for mailbox. In stdin mode you should supply 2 lines"<<endl
00057         <<"for each mailbox: e-mail, password."<<endl;
00058 }

00060 /*
00061  *
00062  */
00063 bool user_pass(const string &e, const string &p)
00064 {
00065     string u, d;
00066     string::size_type atpos;
00067     if(!quiet) cout<<e<<": ";
00068     if( (atpos=e.find('@')) == string::npos
00069         || (u = e.substr(0,atpos)).empty()
00070         || (d = e.substr(atpos+1)).empty() ) {
00071             if(!quiet)
00072                     cout<<"invalid e-mail"<<endl;
00073             return quiet;
00074     }
00075     char ret;
00076     if((ret=vq->user_pass(u,d,p))) {
00077             if(!quiet)
00078                     cout<<vq->err_report()<<endl;
00079             return quiet;
00080     } else {
00081             if(!quiet)
00082                     cout<<"password was changed."<<endl;
00083     }
00084     return 0;
00085 }

00089 int main(int ac, char **av)
00090 {
00091     me = *av;
00092     try {
00093             int opt;
00094             bool sin = false;
00095             while( (opt=getopt(ac,av,"sqh")) != -1 ) {
00096                     switch(opt) {
00097                     case 's':
00098                             sin = true;
00099                             break;
00100                     case 'q':
00101                             quiet=true;
00102                             break;
00103                     default:        
00104                     case '?':
00105                     case 'h':
00106                             usage();
00107                             return(1);
00108                     }
00109             }
00110             if( ! sin && optind >= ac ) {
00111                     usage();
00112                     return(1);
00113             }
00114             ac -= optind;
00115             av += optind;
00116             if( ! sin && ac % 2 ) {
00117                     usage();
00118                     return(1);
00119             }
00120 
00121             vq = cvq::alloc();
00122 
00123             if( sin ) {
00124                     string e,p;
00125                     do {
00126                             if( ! quiet ) {
00127                                     cout << "E-mail: ";
00128                                     cout.flush();
00129                             }
00130                             if( ! getline(cin,e) ) break;
00131                             if( ! quiet ) {
00132                                     cout << "Password: ";
00133                                     cout.flush();
00134                             }
00135                             if( ! getline(cin,p) ) break;
00136                             if( user_pass(e,p) ) return 1;
00137                     } while(cin);
00138             } else {
00139                     if(quiet) ac = 1;
00140                     for(int i=0; i < ac; i+=2 ) {
00141                             if( user_pass(av[i], av[i+1]) )
00142                                     return 1;
00143                     }
00144             }
00145     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00146             cerr << "exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00147             return 1;
00148     }
00149     return 0;
00150 }
